item.title: Shane add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "He gazes through sunlight's buttresses, back down the refectory at the others, wallowing in their plenitude of bananas, thick palatals of their hunger lost somewhere in the stretch of morning between them and himself. A hundred miles of it, so suddenly. Solitude, even among the meshes of this war, can when it wishes so take him by the blind gut and touch, as now, possessively. Pirate's again some other side of a window, watching strangers eat breakfast." -- Thomas Pynchon

item.title: Shane add a quote by Thomas Pynchon
item.description: "They're in love. Fuck the war." -- Thomas Pynchon
